UniprotID	O75063
Accession	O75063;Q5W0C3;Q5W0C4
EntryName	XYLK_HUMAN
ProteinName	Glycosaminoglycan xylosylkinase (EC 2.7.1.-) (Xylose kinase)
GeneName	FAM20B KIAA0475
Length	409
Function	Responsible for the 2-O-phosphorylation of xylose in the glycosaminoglycan-protein linkage region of proteoglycans thereby regulating the amount of mature GAG chains. Sulfated glycosaminoglycans (GAGs), including heparan sulfate and chondroitin sulfate, are synthesized on the so-called common GAG-protein linkage region (GlcUAbeta1-3Galbeta1-3Galbeta1-4Xylbeta1-O-Ser) of core proteins, which is formed by the stepwise addition of monosaccharide residues by the respective specific glycosyltransferases. Xylose 2-O-phosphorylation may influence the catalytic activity of B3GAT3 (GlcAT-I) which completes the precursor tetrasaccharide of GAG-protein linkage regions on which the repeating disaccharide region is synthesized.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus membrane
Disorder	0.0198,0.0119,0.0091,0.0073,0.0066,0.0056,0.0045,0.0040,0.0034,0.0042,0.0051,0.0046,0.0033,0.0034,0.0025,0.0025,0.0026,0.0025,0.0032,0.0042,0.0054,0.0054,0.0066,0.0095,0.0146,0.0235,0.0473,0.1028,0.1791,0.2609,0.1449,0.1501,0.2193,0.2951,0.3426,0.4507,0.4441,0.3392,0.4330,0.3529,0.3599,0.2715,0.2715,0.3321,0.3182,0.2224,0.2193,0.2193,0.2193,0.1399,0.1731,0.2849,0.3087,0.2002,0.2575,0.2002,0.1643,0.1399,0.2258,0.1298,0.1275,0.0749,0.1501,0.1791,0.1643,0.1092,0.1048,0.1184,0.1229,0.1251,0.2064,0.2258,0.2399,0.1323,0.2292,0.1881,0.2129,0.2002,0.2364,0.1969,0.2645,0.3053,0.3872,0.3599,0.3599,0.2470,0.2224,0.3215,0.2575,0.2541,0.1731,0.1643,0.0817,0.0749,0.1275,0.1298,0.1611,0.1476,0.1823,0.1501,0.1115,0.0870,0.0605,0.0334,0.0372,0.0364,0.0676,0.1298,0.1275,0.1070,0.0704,0.0568,0.0555,0.1184,0.1184,0.1184,0.0646,0.0618,0.1048,0.1137,0.1373,0.1528,0.1731,0.2715,0.3529,0.3529,0.3807,0.2849,0.2503,0.2541,0.2224,0.2918,0.3983,0.4017,0.3872,0.3631,0.3774,0.4051,0.3807,0.3566,0.2399,0.2364,0.2224,0.2951,0.2783,0.1942,0.1229,0.1048,0.0967,0.1115,0.1070,0.1554,0.1671,0.1092,0.0780,0.0494,0.0581,0.0531,0.0398,0.0327,0.0414,0.0506,0.0506,0.0870,0.0888,0.0531,0.0870,0.1554,0.1137,0.1731,0.1791,0.1942,0.2292,0.1399,0.1373,0.1823,0.2436,0.1449,0.0929,0.1702,0.1671,0.1554,0.2328,0.2470,0.2470,0.1528,0.1323,0.0835,0.0719,0.0985,0.0676,0.0380,0.0214,0.0127,0.0188,0.0334,0.0349,0.0372,0.0888,0.1184,0.0676,0.0835,0.0870,0.0817,0.0780,0.0463,0.0631,0.1323,0.2034,0.2002,0.1554,0.2399,0.2503,0.2292,0.2399,0.2715,0.2645,0.2034,0.1048,0.1070,0.0780,0.1424,0.1583,0.1424,0.1399,0.1275,0.2129,0.1554,0.1424,0.1399,0.1449,0.1206,0.1162,0.1852,0.2849,0.3566,0.2470,0.2094,0.2609,0.2645,0.2503,0.2399,0.2364,0.2575,0.2645,0.1852,0.1137,0.1007,0.1554,0.1137,0.1137,0.1092,0.1791,0.1791,0.1852,0.1184,0.1275,0.1914,0.2193,0.2470,0.3529,0.2609,0.2715,0.2752,0.1823,0.1229,0.2034,0.3053,0.2680,0.2436,0.1942,0.2064,0.1373,0.0851,0.0518,0.0433,0.0817,0.0646,0.0704,0.0704,0.0568,0.0543,0.0506,0.0929,0.0
